thread.title: Tamara Ecclestone breastfeeds daughter Sophia, 2, in beautiful photo and thanks photographer for 'spreading the message'
thread.title_full: Tamara Ecclestone breastfeeds daughter Sophia, 2, in beautiful photo and thanks photographer for 'spreading the message'

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Tamara Ecclestone breastfeeds daughter Sophia, 2, in beautiful photo and thanks photographer for 'spreading the message'
text:
Tamara Ecclestone breastfeeds daughter Sophia, 2, in beautiful photo and thanks photographer for 'spreading the message' The mum-of-one recently said she has no plans to stop breastfeeding her daughter any time soon Share Jay Rutland, Tamara Ecclestone and their daughter Sophia Eccelstone-Rutland (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Tamara Ecclestone has shared a candid shot of herself breastfeeding daughter Sophia with her 250,000 Instagram followers. 
The daughter of billionaire Bernie Ecclestone posed for a beautiful shot with Sophia, who turns three in March, in her lavish London home. 
Alongside the candid picture, Tamara, who looks angelic in a floaty white gown as Sophia sits on her knee, thanked photographer Ivette Ivens for "spreading this message". 
"Thank you @ivetteivens for capturing this beautiful moment this is by far my favourite photograph but mainly thank you for spreading this message," she wrote. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQQOBJpDQIM/?taken-by=ivetteivens&hl=en/embed 
"Breastfeeding is a powerful demonstration of love and nurturing yet it has become so normal to hide. I want to take that normal and toss it." 
Ivette also shared the same picture and simply captioned it, "Breastfeeding goddess" - the name of her book which features a collection of women breastfeeding their children. 
Late last year, Tamara said she has no plans to stop breastfeeding her daughter. Tamara Ecclestone and daughter Sophia attend the UK Premiere of "Finding Dory" at the Odeon Leicester Square (Photo: Getty) 
She told Fabulous Magazine : “When there are people walking around the streets these days in thongs and bras, I’m like: ‘Really? Can anyone say anything?’ I find it bizarre what people’s priorities are.” 
“My boobs are like a tap!" joked the star. Sophia Ecclestone and Tamara Ecclestone attend the UK Premiere of "Finding Dory" at Odeon Leicester Square (Photo: Getty) 
But when questioned about getting Sophia to move on from being breast fed, Tamara made it clear that she has no intentions of changing her routine at the moment. 
“We’ll cross that bridge if it comes to it, but for now she’s my baby. You’re doing something that is so amazing for your child, but it can cause such hostility and anger." 
She continued: "Sophia is two and a half and yes, a lot of people wouldn’t breastfeed now. 
"But it’s so comforting for her and she loves it. Although I’m going to have the saggiest boobs around by the time she’s finished," added the star. Tamara Ecclestone out and about, London (Photo: Rex) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
